name: Balance of Kingdoms
description:
Balance of Kingdoms is about building, balancing and battling, combining elements of strategy and physics. Players must build a kingdom balanced on top of a beam while trying to defeat their opponent.BuildBuild your Kingdom with limited resources and prepare for battle or test yourself with a series of Build Challenges.BalanceBe careful where you place your buildings! Your Kingdom is on top of a beam which will need to be kept balance! In a battle you can use this to your advantage and attempt to unbalance your opponent's town!BattleGo head to head with other players in a real time multiplayer battle! Use cannons, catapults or magic to topple your foe!MultiplayerIn the Early Access stage, Balance of Kingdoms will have split screen local multiplayer. Online multiplayer is planned for the near future.SingleplayerSee how long your Kingdom can last in the Survival mode or build without any time or gold limits in Freebuild mode.
After early access each Kingdom will have their own singleplayer campaign and story.
